availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David P. Buckner (Kenton County, Kentucky, planter and prov govt)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, planter and provision government convention member. Kentucky native. Son of Henry M. Buckner and Ethalene Buckner. Planter in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 349.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
